name: vipExpiredTemplate
rule:
return [ [ expiredTemplate: ''' VIP Expiration Warning Good morning, ${sponsorName}:

Thank you for being a Sponsor in our VIP System.
We had previously notified you regarding the individual(s) listed below and your continued sponsorship of their VIP affiliation with USF.

This notification serves to inform you that the individual(s) have been removed from our VIP System and no longer have access to USF resources:

<% templateData.groupBy {"${it.gid}-${it.created_vipid}"}.values().each { group -> group.each { persons -> %> <%="" %><% } %> <% } %>
FirstName LastName Expiration Date Group
${persons.fname}${persons.lname}${persons.expiration_dt}${groupName}


If there is a business reason for which the individual needs to be approved for a VIP affiliation, please submit a new VIP request (one person per request) at your earliest convenience.
Within the request, please provide the business reason for the VIP affiliation request, including their current relationship with your department and USF.
Please visit the VIP System page for more information:

www.usf.edu/it/services/vip.aspx

We appreciate your time and assistance in ensuring only authorized persons have access to USF services and resources, thus protecting the information contained therein.

If you have any questions, please contact USF-IT Security for more information.

Thank you.

VIP System Owner
USF --Information Security
''']]
